reviews.text: I found Phuket a hard place to find a decent hotel.
reviews.title: Not bad for Phuket

reviews.text: We went over the xmas/New Years period so everything seemed to be booked out although there didnt seem to be an overabundance of people around. Weird?
reviews.title: Five star luxury room in great location.

reviews.text: If you wanted to be really picky about this hotel you could be. The location was too far away for my liking, even getting a meal outside the hotel included a considerable walk if you wanted variety. There are two cafe/restaurants straight across the street however.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, poor service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose this hotel for the large pool access rooms and swim up bar, and we weren't disappointed. It's worth staying here just for happy hour at the pool bar alone.
reviews.title: Awesome pool - can't beat happy hour at the pool bar

likes.disliked: — few staff members can speak english

reviews.text: We stayed in a pool access room, and the sheer luxury of stepping off your terrace into the pool, and swimming over to the bar for a cocktail, is just wonderful! There are areas in the pool where you can sit and enjoy spa jets on your back while you drink your delicious cocktail and enjoy the late sun. Superb.
reviews.title: Loved the Patong Paragon Hotel

reviews.text: The room itself is huge, comfortable and very clean. The hotel itself is pleasantly thai/contemporary in design, and has a great coffee shop on the corner. Its a quick walk to the Rock bar/restaurant, and not much further to the thick of it! The hotel offers a free shuttle to the shopping mall which is great also.
reviews.title: Paragon fabulous hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our only gripe, was we couldn't order room service, because there is a serious lack of english speaking staff. But that is the only time we could not access service due to language barriers.
reviews.title: Give this hotel a break!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast is fabulous with lots to choose from, but the restaurant is very expensive.
reviews.title: Beautiful pool area!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was a very nice hotel, 4 stars but I would give it 5
reviews.title: Perfect Hotel for a honeymoon

likes.liked: — it was clean and beutiful and near the beach.

reviews.text: I booked it on the internet www.latestays.com it's much cheaper that way alomost 50% less than to book it at the hotel.
reviews.title: What a hotel! Loved it so much the first time we came back 3days later!

reviews.text: My 3 kids, my husband, my parents and I stayed in Paragon Patong hotel from 24th to 27th October 2008. We arrive quite late at night and checking in was fast. One problem arises when I realised that all the 3 rooms were only given one key per room. Any request for additional keys (2 keys per room) were extremely , extremely reluctantly given and threatened with a fine of THB300 per key if lost or not return upon checking out .
reviews.title: Beatiful resort style hotel like 5 star type but not not 5 star services

likes.disliked: — Too far from Patong town especially for older travellers and family with kids.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is beautiful with a resort like feel and the swimming pool was fantastic surrounded by the rooms. The ambience of the hotel makes you feel in a holiday mood. The hotel rooms and its bathrooms were tastefully done with large spaces and a balcony either overseeing the beach front or pool.
reviews.title: Comfy Bed, Nice Band

likes.liked: — Bed, swimming pool and live band

reviews.text: However I would not recommend this place to anyone. On our last night before departure next morning, my mum asked me if she could use the laundry bags in the bedroom and after looking through he list of items that you need to pay if you take for example the towel etc.... So since the laundry bags (made from cloth) was not listed , I told my mum to go ahead and used the laundry bag.
reviews.title: Tranquil little hotel - beach views - just outside town centre

likes.liked: — Location - quiet area only 5 mins from walking street, best of both worlds
likes.disliked: — You cant leave the AC on when you leave the room, they have a devious system that cant be fooled!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Imagine my surprise that upon checking out, I was told that I need to pay THB225 for the laundry bag. So I told my mum about it. However my parents told me they have enquired and was told by the bellboy who came to collect our bags that the laundry bags will be charged. My mum took out the bag in front of the bellboy and put it back in the room. This was told to the checkout counter lady but she just made a few phone calls. And we sat there waiting ......waiting ..... and finally I asked her if everything was okay. That was when the problem started, she said she is still waiting for us to return the laundry bag and we explained to her again that the bag is already in the room. Then she made some more calls and we waited again. This went on for a few times. At this point I was not too happy and we have been waiting for sometime and no explanation was given as to yes or no we can go and we were already late for the airport. She still insisted that we returned the laundry bag. I told her to give me back the key to my parents' room and my daughter went up to the room and took the laundry bags (2 of them) back to the reception counter counter to prove that we didn't take them. It was embarassing and humilating like we were stealing their stuff. There were other guests at that time and you can imagine our feelings and frustrations.
reviews.title: Loved the atmosphere

reviews.text: I was very angry and upset at that because there were 3 things that she should have done as a person in the hospitality industry : 1) ask the houseking staff or bellboy to check , 2) TALK to us instead of us asking them what is happening and 3) Apologise to us when I asked her why the laundry bag was not listed as chargebles and not just saying that it is chargeable. I would have thought that all chargeable items in any hotels worldwide will be written down. My advise is not to take anything for granted in this hotel.
reviews.title: Wonderful holiday, fantastic hotel.
